entry.title: Something on my mind
entry.content:
Again, this time of the year. I am alone in my rental home watching the stream of CaseOh, who is driving in the woods in the middle of the night and filming himself with his cellphone. This simple pleasure in life just makes me question the meaning of my entire existence, especially when I am temporarily free from the daily suffering for just a few days.

I just feel like my life is nonsense. Sure, doing ML and mech interp research is interesting and psychologically rewarding. But it doesn’t ensure me peace of life and mind—it just occupies the entirety of my life and totally eliminates the boundary between work life and personal life. In the end, I just deliberately trap myself in a loop that drains my energy and makes me less pleasant and “chill”.

The cycle goes like this. I devise a project that sparks my interest; I work relentlessly and in fear, trying to verify if my idea works; if the idea kind of works, I would yield a research paper as the outcome in around 2–4 months; I submit the paper to an over-crowded conference and battle with reviewers; I either get my paper accepted or revise and resubmit. Somewhere in the middle, I get bored with the current project and start working on a new project. The loop has repeated three or four times so far, and will continue for the next few years.

I sense I have become the boring nerd who doesn’t know what to chat about besides research topics. I just hate this. I hate it that work is the only meaningful thing in my life, and I hate to be defined by my work and only my work. There must be more to life than this.

People say you must aspire for something in order to finally achieve it. Okay, here are my fantasies. I want to adopt a kitten and raise it like my own child, and hopefully it teaches me how to love another person and even myself. I want to go on a date and possibly fall in love or break my own heart, whatever the outcome. I want to sit in the sun at the park around my house and just stare into the distance in a trance, then I go back home and cook a tofu dish that I used to like. I want my friends to be just one call away and we can simply accompany one another in silence.

entry.title: 随笔
entry.content:
中午去吃了叉烧饭，嚼着嚼着，心觉这叉烧饭太好吃了，感动得有点想哭。

最近两个月以来天气变冷了，一楼食堂的质量日渐下滑不能果腹，所以我开始每天中午都去二楼的广东风味窗口吃饭。 多数时候是重复的叉烧饭，偶尔会吃腩仔饭换换胃口。档口的小哥都认识我了，默认我吃叉烧饭。

当rebuttal和人际关系的不确定性轰炸我时，还是一碗精致的叉烧饭最能抚慰我的内心。
